detaileddescription.para: It indicates number of bytes to transfer

briefdescription.para: check if I2C FIFO is full
check if I2C FIFO is half

simplesect.para: When I2C is transmitting data, it indicates if fifo is half-empty;
When I2C is receiving data, it indicates if fifo is half full.

parameterdescription.para: if FIFO is half empty or full

briefdescription.para: check if I2C FIFO is empty

parameterdescription.para:
value
true: receive data if master mode, send data in slave mode
false: send data if master mode, reveive data in slave mode

value
true: send data if master mode, receive data in slave mode
false: receive data if master mode, send data in slave mode

value
true: the sda line is high
false: the sda line is low

value
true: the scl line is high
false: the scl line is low

detaileddescription.para: Disable interrupts based on given mask
Enable interrupts based on given mask
Disable I2C auto generates proper acknowledgements for each byte received
Enable I2C auto generates proper acknowledgements for each byte received
enable 10 bit address mode, if not, address is 7 bit mode
Initialized I2C controller working at master mode

parameterdescription.para: I2C controller source clock source frequency in Hz
status_success if initialization is completed without any error

memberdef.name: i2c_master_address_write

briefdescription.para: I2C master write data to specific address of certain slave device.

detaileddescription.para:
Write to certain I2C device at specific address within that device
the sum of addr_size_in_byte and size_in_byte should not not greater than I2C_SOC_TRANSFER_COUNT_MAX
ptr
I2C base address
device_address
I2C slave address
addr
address in that I2C device
addr_size_in_byte
I2C address in byte
buf
pointer of the data to be sent
size_in_byte
size of data to be sent in bytes
hpm_stat_t
status_success if writing is completed without any error

Read fram certain I2C device at specific address within that device
both addr_size_in_byte and size_in_byte should not not greater than I2C_SOC_TRANSFER_COUNT_MAX

device_address
I2C slave address

address in that I2C device

I2C address in byte

size_in_byte
size of data to be read in bytes
hpm_stat_t
status_success if reading is completed without any error

briefdescription.para: I2C events for interrupt enable and status check.

memberdef.name: I2C_EVENT_ALL_MASK
memberdef.initializer: (I2C_INTEN_CMPL_MASK \ | I2C_INTEN_BYTERECV_MASK \ | I2C_INTEN_BYTETRANS_MASK \ | I2C_INTEN_START_MASK \ | I2C_INTEN_STOP_MASK \ | I2C_INTEN_ARBLOSE_MASK \ | I2C_INTEN_ADDRHIT_MASK \ | I2C_INTEN_FIFOHALF_MASK \ | I2C_INTEN_FIFOFULL_MASK \ | I2C_INTEN_FIFOEMPTY_MASK)

briefdescription.para: I2C status for status check only.

memberdef.name: I2C_ADDR_10BIT
memberdef.initializer: (1u << 2) /* this is a ten bit chip address */

memberdef.name: I2C_NO_READ_ACK
memberdef.initializer: (1u << 6) /* when I2C reading, we do not ACK */

memberdef.name: I2C_WRITE_CHECK_ACK
memberdef.initializer: (1u << 8) /* when I2C writing, need check the slave returns ack */

memberdef.name: i2c_master_seq_transmit
memberdef.initializer: i2c_master_seq_transmit_check_ack(ptr, device_address, buf, size, opt, false)

briefdescription.para: sequential transmit in master I2C mode an amount of data and checks ACK in blocking, but does not check for ACK signals.

parameterdescription.para: pointer of the buffer to store data sent from device
size of data to be sent in bytes
status_success if transmit is completed without any error
